item.title: Profile
item.description: My name is RÃ©mi Gillig, I am a video game tools software engineer. I like C++, C# and making tools for everyone. It has a great impact on the projects and usually involves a number of other disciplines. I am also interested in procedural generation and rendering and I like to follow the advances in these areas through SIGGRAPH and GDC talks, lectures and research papers. I’m currently working at Rare Ltd.
